name: ml-model.decision-transformer-jupyter
command: cd /workspace/video-diffusion && pip install -e . && WANDB_RUN_ID=ma0 NO_MPI=1 WANDB_API_KEY=c595e7efe9bbd1b1e0ca021c5e53e979394e53f0 python -m torch.distributed.run --nproc_per_node 4 scripts/video_train.py --dataset minerl --batch_size 8 --max_frames 20 --observed_frames x_0 --num_res_blocks 1 --data_path /workspace/data/ --mask_distribution autoregressive-10 --num_workers 14
